show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
It’s Open Forum, the First Edition for 2014! <!--more--> You’ve been walking around with heavy thoughts that have weighed you down since last year.

Well, unburden yourself.
Bring them to the gathering place for the exchange of information, opinions and ideas, and lay them before us all.
You’ll feel much, much better, even if you’re asked to explain yourself – with due respect, of course!
